Connecting to Canto
As an EVM compatible chain, you can connect to the Canto network using MetaMask. Assuming you have already installed and configured MetaMask in your browser of choice, start by adding the Canto network:
1.
Open the MetaMask extension.
2.
At the top of the interface, click on the network you are connected to e.g. "Ethereum Mainnet".
3.
Click on "Add Network":


​
4.
Enter the following RPC settings:

Network Name: CANTO
New RPC URL: https://canto.slingshot.finance
Chain ID: 7700
Currency Symbol: CANTO
Block Explorer URL: https://evm.explorer.canto.io/​
Alternative RPC URLs
Testnet RPC URL
After saving the network, you will be able to connect to it at any time using the dropdown menu.
If you skip this step and attempt to connect to applications on https://canto.io/, a MetaMask prompt will appear allowing you to add the network with a single click.

interactions.response: Canto is an open-source blockchain platform with smart contract functionality that enables users to bridge assets, provide liquidity, lend, borrow, and stake. It provides a unit of account ($NOTE) and its own decentralized exchange (DEX) and lending market (CLM).

interactions.input: How can I connect to Canto?
interactions.response: You can connect to the Canto network using MetaMask. Start by adding the Canto network to MetaMask by entering the RPC settings. Once saved, you can connect to the network at any time by choosing it from the dropdown menu. Alternatively, if you attempt to connect to applications on https://canto.io/, a MetaMask prompt will appear allowing you to add the network with a single click.

responses: Canto is a layer-1 blockchain built to deliver on the promise of DeFi. It enables accessibility, transparency, and freedom for new systems, and is powered by free public infrastructure. Canto provides a new commons for users to access a variety of services, such as bridging assets, providing liquidity, lending and borrowing, staking, and governance. You can find more information about Canto on our website, canto.io.

You can connect to the Canto network using MetaMask. To do this, open the MetaMask extension, click on the network you are connected to, and then click on "Add Network". Enter the following RPC settings: Network Name: Canto, New RPC URL: https://canto.slingshot.finance, Chain ID: 7700, Currency Symbol: CANTO, Block Explorer URL: https://evm.explorer.canto.io/. After saving the network, you will be able to connect to it at any time using the dropdown menu.
